title: Ep 449 | Phil Is Grossed Out by Jase's Ears & Jase Declares the Human Body a Big Basket of Doom
description:
Jase shares a story about the time a critter decided to make its home inside his ear, and Phil suggests he cleans them more regularly. Al reasons about life after death and the glorified body Jesus had after the resurrection. Jase mentions Paul's thorn in his flesh and calls the human body one big basket of doom. And Al asks the the numerous questions surrounding death and what our bodies will be like, based on scripture.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://SuperBeets.com/PHIL and get up to 45% off plus free shipping
